original_text:
The Lord of hosts has sworn in my hearing:
“Surely many houses shall be desolate,
    large and beautiful houses, without inhabitant.
korean_text: 만군의 여호와께서 내 귀에 말씀하시되 정녕히 허다한 가옥이 황폐하리니 크고 아름다울지라도 거주할 자가 없을 것이며

sentences.original_text: The Lord of hosts has sworn in my hearing
Surely many houses shall be desolate
large and beautiful houses, without inhabitant
sentences.korean_translation: 크고 아름다운 집들은 거주하는 자가 없으리라
